query:
SELECT 'activity_records' as table_name, COUNT(*) as remaining_count FROM activity_records
UNION ALL
SELECT 'activity_head_to_head', COUNT(*) FROM activity_head_to_head
UNION ALL
SELECT 'activity_checkpoint', COUNT(*) FROM activity_checkpoint;
